content:
@David Hay I can't seem to access any old logical models in the LM tool. All I see is the Breast Cancer Form. And when I try to whip one up use an existing resource I get this unhappy message:

{"msg":"No matching profile (http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition) found on http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu3/StructureDefinition (but not a server error - just not present)"}
Which server were you using? Unfortunately we cleared the hapi database to move it to a more powerful server...
whatever the default is. should I point to another one?
I'm working with Grahame to set up a server at fhir.org that we can will make sure persists...
and you're right = Activity definition ain't there (though Patient is). Can you copy the SD across for now? Will ask James what's happened to them...
